actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act authorizing the Fryingpan-Arkansas Federal reclamation project, Colo., in order to increase the amount authorized for such project (act of August 16, 1962, 76 Stat. 389) and to authorize construction of a second 100-megawatt unit at the Mt. Elbert Pumped Storage Power Plant site of such project.

summary.text: Provides for an increase in the amount authorized for the Fryingpan-Arkansas Federal reclamation project. Authorizes the construction of a second one hundred-megawatt unit at the Mount Elbert pumped storage powerplant site of such project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act authorizing the Fryingpan-Arkansas Federal reclamation project, Colo., in order to increase the amount authorized for such project (act of August 16, 1962, 76 Stat. 389) and to authorize construction of a second 100-megawatt unit at the Mt. Elbert Pumped Storage Power Plant site of such project.
